data.message: Validate test_coverage_verifier skill: All features validated with synthetic test data. 3 format parsers working (Cobertura XML, JSON, LCOV). Features tested: threshold enforcement, uncovered file reporting, regression detection, exclusion patterns. Skill is production-ready.
data.outcome: All features validated with synthetic test data. 3 format parsers working (Cobertura XML, JSON, LCOV). Features tested: threshold enforcement, uncovered file reporting, regression detection, exclusion patterns. Skill is production-ready.
